content.en: Achilles ultrasound analysis: Researchers have developed various algorithms to address different research questions related to the Achilles tendon. These algorithms use ultrasound imaging to analyze and measure different aspects of the tendon, such as tissue characteristics, displacement, thickness, micro-morphology, strain patterns, and stiffness. By utilizing these algorithms, scientists aim to better understand the structure and function of the Achilles tendon, as well as identify differences between healthy and injured tendons.
content.da: Achilles-ultralydsanalyse: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at tackle forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til akillessenen. Disse algoritmer bruger ultralydsbilleder til at analysere og måle forskellige aspekter af senen, såsom vævskarakteristika, forskydning, tykkelse, mikromorfologi, belastningsmønstre og stivhed. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer sigter videnskabsfolk mod at få en bedre forståelse af akillessenens struktur og funktion samt at identificere forskelle mellem sunde og skadede sener.
